channel.title: ruby on Hexgolems

item.title: Hexslides: Death to Death by Powerpoint!
item.description: An opinionated tool to create beautiful presentations containing complex animations.

item.title: Pwgen
item.description: A human friendly pwgen based on XKCD 936

item.title: RDBG
item.description: A ruby programmable debugger library based on the linux ptrace API and /proc/$pid/ interfaces.

item.title: Reverse Game Of Life
item.description: Use a SMT solver to invert the arrow of time in Game Of Life.

item.title: SchemDBG
item.description: A web based debugger front-end for debugging and reversing binaries. Easily allows to create complex widgets and scripts.

item.title: Brainfuck JIT
item.description: A compiler, interpreter and JITer for brainfuck. Build in literate ruby.

item.title: CodeWars
item.description: A competitive programming challenge similar to Corewars, used in 2011 RWTH-CTF
